1.title: When formulating an opinion
1.a: I keep my body leaning back.
1.b: I keep my body upright or leaning forward when expressing myself.

2.title: When speaking
2.a: I don't use my hands much when I talk.
2.b: I usually use my hands when I talk.

5.title: I use strong gestures
5.a: It is rare that he uses strong, definitive gestures
5.b: I frequently use strong, definitive gestures.

6.title: The expressions on my face
6.a: They don't always express what I feel.

8.title: I appear
8.b: A habitual disposition to have fun and have a good time.

10.title: I use
10.a: A reduced range of voice inflections.
10.b: Many and very diverse voice inflections.

eleven.title: In situations where they do not act
eleven.a: I don't have a tendency to pressure others to act.
eleven.b: I have a tendency to pressure others to act.

12.title: With my feelings or emotions
12.a: I don't tend to show feelings spontaneously.
12.b: I tend to show feelings spontaneously.

18.title: With my anecdotes
18.a: It is rare that he tells anecdotes or participates in casual conversations.
18.b: I usually tell anecdotes and participate in casual conversations.
